channel.title: Lagex Recruits
channel.description:
Looking for a hoster...
Requirements...
1. Have to be able to host this server only
2. Must be able to code.
3. Must be portforwarded, and be able to access no-ip.
4. Can't be involved in any other projects...
Thanks,
Lagex Staff...
MSN Messenger ruinscape@live.com YAHOO IM ruinscapegame@yahoo.com
Contact us there.
############################################################################################### I am going out to play in the snow, so it might take a little while until you're added to our messengers.

item.title: Lagex Recruits
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:162072”]The last time you posted this you were unsuccessful, so why bother posting it again?
And why can’t you host it yourself?[/quote]

I do have another hoster. (Hosting 2 versions…)

I am doing both silabs, 1 dodian, and 1 my personalized. Thanks for the in put, but you don’t know what’s going on.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 11:39:09 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Runer King”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=220468.msg1909683#msg1909683 date=1196591667]
The last time you posted this you were unsuccessful, so why bother posting it again?
And why can’t you host it yourself?
[/quote]

I do have another hoster. (Hosting 2 versions…)

I am doing both silabs, 1 dodian, and 1 my personalized. Thanks for the in put, but you don’t know what’s going on.[/quote]

also, I am going outside in the snow, so post away…

Read full topic
